about:
Hello! My name is Sharath, and I'm an application developer.

 My development journey started during my engineering days, when I started to explore app development opportunities for the Nokia Asha Android device. The journey continued with Blackberry apps, Android apps, and Windows apps.

 Today, I am a solution architect at an MNC with 10 years of experience. 

 I am a hobby application developer. I develop apps for mobile and the web.
bio: I'm a Mobile and Web Application developer.

journey.title: Hobby Application Developer
journey.description:
I am an experienced hobby app developer, proficient in both web and mobile development. I have a passion for creating engaging and innovative apps that cater to the needs of users. 

 With my expertise in various programming languages and frameworks, I can develop apps that operate seamlessly across various platforms and devices.

journey.title: Sharepoint Developer and Designer
journey.description:
Currently, I am developing SharePoint applications using SPFx with React and No Javascript Framework, Power Apps with Canvas App, and Power Automate to achieve business requirements for O365. 

 I started my career with SharePoint 2010, where I explored Console applications, Webpart development, Event Receivers, Termstores, the REST API, and workflows. followed by Sharepoint 2013 Script Editor, REST API, and Sharepoint Hosted App.

journey.title: Microsoft Student Partners, Robogyan - Leader, NEN - Core Comitte Member
journey.description:
As a MSP, I have conducted sessions on Microsoft Stack. 

 Robotics sessions were conducted monthly for Robogyan Members. 

 part of the entrepreneurial decision-makers.

projects.name: Sanskrit Hangman
projects.description: Welcome to Sanskrit Hangman, the ultimate word-guessing game designed for Sanskrit enthusiasts of all ages! Dive into the ancient language of Sanskrit and put your vocabulary skills to the test by guessing words correctly to save the stick figure from hanging.

projects.name: Kannada Hangman
projects.description: Welcome to Kannada Hangman, the ultimate word-guessing game designed for Kannada language enthusiasts of all ages! Put your Kannada vocabulary skills to the test as you embark on a thrilling journey to save the stick figure from hanging by correctly guessing Kannada words.

projects.name: Kannada Cinema
projects.description: Welcome to the ultimate destination for Kannada Cinema enthusiasts – our specially curated Kannada Cinema app! Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Kannada films, where tradition meets innovation and storytelling takes center stage.

projects.name: Movie Explain
projects.description: The Movie Explain app is a platform that provides users with detailed explanations of movies, TV shows, and other forms of visual media.

projects.name: Kannada Ogatugalu
projects.description: Discover the wisdom and cultural richness of Kannada language through this app (ಕನ್ನಡ ಒಗಟುಗಳು), designed to provide you with a vast array of traditional Ogatu (ಒಗಟು) that have been passed down through generations.

projects.name: Kannada Gaadegalu
projects.description: This app (ಕನ್ನಡ ಗಾದೆಗಳು) provides a collection of Kannada proverbs and sayings. It also allows users to search and save their favorite gaade (proverb) in an intuitive way.

projects.name: Thought Probe
projects.description: Welcome to Thought Probe, the ultimate mind reading challenge! In this game, game will guess what you are thinking.

projects.name: Train your brain | Puzzle
projects.description: Looking for a fun and challenging way to train your brain? Try out Train your brain puzzle game!

projects.name: Memory | Puzzle Challenge
projects.description: Are you ready to test your memory skills? Take the Memory Puzzle Challenge!

projects.name: Math | Puzzle Challenge
projects.description: The Math Puzzle Challenge is an exciting game that tests your problem-solving skills and mathematical abilities.

projects.name: Bhakti Sudhe
projects.description: Bhakti Sudhe (ಭಕ್ತಿ ಸುಧೆ) hosts lyrics of Hindu Mythological Gods. Aim is to provide a central place for lyrics for a needy Theist. App is available in Kannada and English.

projects.name: XO : Beat Me
projects.description: Tictoetoe Puzzle's AI algorithm and ability to take decisions on its own make the app distinctive.

projects.name: UrgeBlood
projects.description: UrgeBlood was developed to serve blood to needy people by providing a connection between the Blood Donor and the Requester.

projects.name: Mind Reader
projects.description: Mind teaser free application developed based on Mathematics
